description: Document Classifier enables training document classifier models.

DataAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+  
Update requires: Replacement

LanguageCode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: en | es | fr | it | de | pt  
Update requires: Replacement

ModelPolicy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 20000  
Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentClassifierName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Mode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: MULTI_CLASS | MULTI_LABEL  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VersionName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AugmentedManifests.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DataFormat.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: COMPREHEND_CSV | AUGMENTED_MANIFEST  
Update requires: No interruption

LabelDelimiter.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1  
Pattern: ^[ ~!@#$%^*\-_+=|\\:;\t>?/]$  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PLAIN_TEXT_DOCUMENT | SEMI_STRUCTURED_DOCUMENT  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentClassifierInputDataConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeNames.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Split.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TRAIN | TEST  
Update requires: No interruption

AugmentedManifestsListItem.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentClassifierDocuments.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentReadAction.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TEXTRACT_DETECT_DOCUMENT_TEXT | TEXTRACT_ANALYZE_DOCUMENT  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentReadMode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SERVICE_DEFAULT | FORCE_DOCUMENT_READ_ACTION  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TABLES | FORMS  
Update requires: No interruption

FeatureTypes.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentReaderConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentClassifierOutputDataConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: [-0-9a-zA-Z]+  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: [-0-9a-zA-Z]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Subnets.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Uri.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: s3://[a-z0-9][\.\-a-z0-9]{1,61}[a-z0-9](/.*)?  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:comprehend:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]{12}:document-classifier/[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*(/version/[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*)?  
Update requires: No interruption
